title: Determinantal Point Processes
description: Determinantal Point Processes (DPPs) capture notions of both relevance and diversity in a principled manner. DPPs allows the system to recommend a collection of items which is diverse, while retaining relevance, thus attempting to capture different aspects of a customer’s taste and preferences.
description_lemmatized: determinantal point process dpps capture notion relevance diversity principled manner dpps allows system recommend collection item diverse retaining relevance thus attempting capture different aspect customer taste preference
